description:
Hime tries to find a way to save Mitsuki and dispel the rumors swirling about them, but discovers the answer is a lot simpler than she thought. Meanwhile, Sumika starts to look a little bit closer at Kanoko.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: So There`s No Need for Lies Anymore?
Uso wa Hitsuyou Nai no Desuka?
嘘は必要ないのですか?
